segments.text: Did you need help with something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I could , I would like to view the apartment sometime today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That won ’ t be possible today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can only view the apartment with an appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to make one right now if I can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can we do it at 6 o ’ clock ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your appointment for Friday at 6 pm has been confirmed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I ’ ll see you on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2
